comments:
version: epf-composer-1.0-RC2-N20060920-1805-win32

steps:
1 create two custom category A and B
2 open A and assign B to A
3 save and select B in the editor, use "Remove" button to remove B
4 cannot delete B.

5 if select A from library view and delete it by context menu, there is an error. log file is below.

6 or if select B under A from library view, and then delete it by context menu
B under A and B itself are all removed.

expected result:
1 clicking "Remove" button in editor can remove selected custom category (Step 4)
2 should be able to delete A (Step 5)
3 should be able to only delete B under A, and not delete B. (Step 6)


log file:
